t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 3 days ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Amazon Facts That You Probably Didn't Know - Business Insider
s: The idea was that their selection of books would be vast and wide, just like the world's largest river. They did have many other names in mind and still own one of the domains. If you type in Relentless.com in your browser, you will be redirected to Amazon.com.

t: 6 Companies Owned by Amazon
s: Amazon continues to face scrutiny from antitrust regulators. It currently faces a wide-ranging antitrust investigation into its business practices by the Federal Trade Commission (FTC). The FTC's antitrust probe was reported to be focusing on Amazon Web Services as of December 2021.
